title: "Never give up"
body:
I actually came to realize that this is true.

I had a mid Sivir game and we were in a really bad spot.

1st, Kha got 1st Blood on Vi. Then Darius fed Vlad. Then our support Teemo dc'd.

It was us against Vlad, Kha, Ahri(who I skillfully stopped from snowballing), Varus and Braum.

Horrible game it seemed.

But we made it through.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1599956399/34331088

We played as a team and went for objectives. But the surprising thing was....we actually won the teamfights.

Plus, the 1st mid tower didn't go down until late game....Varus had ragequit by that time.

"But Zantheus, it's just a normal game."

I don't give a shit.
